decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to disrupt your opponent's game plan while applying pressure with aggressive creatures. By utilizing cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to remove threats, along with creatures like Flickerwisp and Solitude to control the board, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and close out the game quickly. The inclusion of cards like Relic of Progenitus and Ephemerate also provide additional utility and flexibility to adapt to different situations. Overall, the deck focuses on efficient creature removal and disruptive plays to gain an advantage and secure a victory.

This deck aims to use Underworld Breach in combination with Grinding Station and Mishra's Bauble to create a powerful combo loop that allows for infinite mill and damage. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student help to dig for key pieces while also providing value on the battlefield. Mox Opal and Mox Amber help to ramp and accelerate the deck's game plan. The inclusion of Urza's Saga provides additional value and searching power. Overall, the deck focuses on assembling its combo pieces quickly and efficiently to overwhelm the opponent.

The deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures and using burn spells to quickly reduce the opponent's life total. It also includes cards that provide additional value when creatures are sacrificed, and cards that can disrupt the opponent's strategy. The mana base is built to support the aggressive nature of the deck and ensure consistent access to the necessary colors. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and powerful offensive strategy, utilizing a mix of creatures, burn spells, and disruptive elements to secure victory.

This aggressive deck focuses on quickly flooding the board with powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Scion of Draco. It also utilizes a mix of versatile spells like Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames to control the board and deal direct damage. The Leyline cards provide additional support for the deck's strategy, while cards like Stubborn Denial and Consign to Memory offer protection and card advantage. The mana base is designed to ensure consistent access to all colors of mana needed for the deck's powerful spells and creatures.

The deck focuses on utilizing Amulet of Vigor to generate extra mana and trigger land abilities multiple times in a turn. Primeval Titan is the main win condition, searching for lands like Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and Vesuva to deal massive damage. Arboreal Grazer and Explore help to ramp up quickly, while cards like Scapeshift and Cultivator Colossus provide alternate win conditions. The deck also includes utility lands like Urza's Saga and Boseiju, Who Endures to support the combo strategy and protect against opposing control decks.

The deck aims to ramp up mana quickly with Arboreal Grazer and Amulet of Vigor to cast Primeval Titan. Once Primeval Titan is on the battlefield, it can search for Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and lands to trigger its ability multiple times, dealing a large amount of damage. The deck also utilizes cards like Scapeshift and Malevolent Rumble to deal additional damage or disrupt the opponent's plans. The inclusion of Urza's Saga and various utility lands provide extra value and flexibility in the deck's strategy.

The main focus of this Dimir Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan by utilizing a variety of disruptive spells like counterspells, hand disruption, and removal. The deck aims to control the board through efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Dismember, while also having access to powerful threats like Murktide Regent to close out the game. The deck also features cards like Thoughtseize and Sink into Stupor to disrupt the opponent's hand and slow down their game plan. With a focus on disruption and control, this deck aims to outlast and outvalue the opponent.

This combo deck relies on using Emry, Lurker of the Loch, Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student, and Grinding Station to generate infinite mana and card draw. With Urza's Saga and Mishra's Bauble to help assemble the combo pieces, the deck aims to win by looping Malevolent Rumble or Grapeshot to burn the opponent out. Underworld Breach serves as a powerful recursion engine, allowing the deck to cast spells from the graveyard. The inclusion of alternate win conditions like Jace, Wielder of Mysteries ensures multiple avenues to victory, making it a versatile and resilient deck in Modern 1 vs 1.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Underworld Breach combo to mill through the library and continually recur powerful cards like Thassa's Oracle and Emry, Lurker of the Loch. It also includes a mix of fast mana sources like Mox Amber and Mox Opal to ramp up quickly and enable explosive turns. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps dig for key pieces while cards like Misty Rainforest and Scalding Tarn provide deck thinning and fixing. The goal is to quickly assemble the combo pieces, generate infinite loops, and win the game in a single explosive turn.

The main focus of this deck is to ramp up mana quickly using cards like Talisman of Impulse and Utopia Sprawl, and utilize Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker to control the game. The deck also includes cards like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble to clear the board of threats. Karn, the Great Creator is included for additional control options, and Eldrazi Temple provides extra mana for summoning powerful creatures. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful Eldrazi creatures and control the game through various spells and abilities.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively and quickly dominate the battlefield using powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Boggart Trawler while disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek. The deck aims to control the game with removal spells like Fatal Push and Fell the Profane, while also utilizing cards like Necrodominance and Soul Spike to finish off the opponent efficiently. The deck's strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast-paced, aggressive approach while maintaining control over the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Overlord of the Balemurk and Ketramose, the New Dawn to put pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Solitude and Relic of Progenitus. It also utilizes flicker effects like Ephemerate and Flickerwisp to gain additional value from entering the battlefield abilities. The deck aims to control the board by removing threats with Fatal Push while also generating card advantage with cards like White Orchid Phantom. The strategy is to outpace the opponent with efficient creatures and disruption.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by countering opponents' spells, removing threats from the board, and utilizing card advantage with planeswalkers like Teferi. The deck also aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan through cards like Narset, Parter of Veils and Orim's Chant. The inclusion of Kaheera as a companion provides additional synergy and a way to further strengthen the control strategy. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to establish control of the game and outvalue the opponent through powerful spells and card advantage.

The main idea of this deck is to use Yawgmoth, Thran Physician and various creatures to create a versatile toolbox that can handle different situations. The deck focuses on assembling specific creature combinations to generate value and disrupt the opponent's strategy. With cards like Chord of Calling and Green Sun's Zenith, the deck can search for key creatures quickly. Additionally, the inclusion of Grist, the Hunger Tide and Malevolent Rumble provide additional synergies and ways to control the board. Boseiju, Who Endures helps protect important spells from countermagic, ensuring the deck's combo can succeed.

This deck focuses on fast and aggressive creature-based strategies, utilizing a mix of red, white, green, and black mana sources to cast powerful threats and removal spells. The key idea is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures like Territorial Kavu and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, while also utilizing Leyline cards and Leyline Binding to control the board. Consign to Memory provides card advantage and removal, while Tribal Flames and Lightning Bolt offer direct damage to finish off opponents. The deck aims to end the game quickly before the opponent can establish their own game plan.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Amulet of Vigor alongside Primeval Titan to quickly ramp up mana and search for key lands such as Urza's Saga and the Urza's lands. This allows for explosive plays with cards like Scapeshift and Cultivator Colossus to overwhelm the opponent with massive threats. The deck also includes various utility lands and cards to help navigate through different situations and ensure the combo pieces come together smoothly. It aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board presence.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on early creature aggression combined with burn spells to quickly overrun your opponent. It also includes disruptive elements like Ranger-Captain of Eos and Static Prison to control the board. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah adds a powerful finisher to the deck, while Seasoned Pyromancer provides card advantage. The deck's mana base is optimized for consistency with fetch lands and dual lands. Overall, the strategy is to apply continuous pressure and close out games before the opponent can stabilize.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly developing a strong board presence and overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures like Seasoned Pyromancer, Ranger-Captain of Eos, and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer. The deck also includes powerful support cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Goblin Bombardment to control the board and deal damage efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Thraben Charm helps to close out games quickly before the opponent can stabilize. The mana base is optimized to ensure consistent and fast plays throughout the game.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient burn spells. The deck aims to quickly put pressure on the opponent by playing low-cost threats like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Ocelot Pride, while also utilizing powerful spells like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Galvanic Discharge to deal damage directly to the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Ranger-Captain of Eos provide additional support and utility to keep the pressure on the opponent and secure a quick victory.

This Boros aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and powerful spells. Utilizing creatures like Ragavan, Ranger-Captain of Eos, and Seasoned Pyromancer, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain a steady stream of threats. Cards like Guide of Souls and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah help to buff and protect the creatures, while cards like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Goblin Bombardment provide additional reach and removal options. The deck's mana base allows for flexibility and consistency in casting its spells.

The deck focuses on utilizing the combo potential of Underworld Breach to fill the graveyard with spells and artifacts, then repeatedly casting them from the graveyard to generate powerful synergies and win conditions. It also incorporates cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student to further enable and support the combo strategy. By using various tools like Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble to generate mana and card advantage, the deck aims to quickly assemble a game-winning board state through means of grinding opponents down with thopter tokens and damage spells like Grapeshot.

The deck aims to consistently combo off with Underworld Breach and Grinding Station to mill the opponent's library and win the game. The deck features powerful artifact engines such as Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Mox Opal to generate mana and card advantage. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides additional card draw and disruption. The deck also includes interaction in the form of countermagic and removal spells to protect the combo. Urza's Saga and Mishra's Bauble help to generate additional value and consistency in executing the combo.

This deck focuses on utilizing Underworld Breach in combination with cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Grinding Station to create a powerful combo engine. By recurring cards from the graveyard and generating mana with artifacts like Mox Opal, the deck aims to quickly assemble its win condition, which can be either Thassa's Oracle or Malevolent Rumble. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage while Urza's Saga helps find key pieces. The deck is designed to be fast and efficient, aiming to win the game before the opponent can set up their own strategy.

The key strategy of this deck is to utilize the Underworld Breach combo to repeatedly cast spells from the graveyard, allowing for a powerful win condition through cards like Grinding Station and Malevolent Rumble. The deck also features a variety of card selection and mana ramping tools to facilitate the combo, and includes disruptive elements like Thassa's Oracle and Pithing Needle to protect the combo from opposing interaction. The goal is to assemble the necessary pieces and execute the combo efficiently to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

This deck utilizes creatures with various abilities to create a toolbox approach, allowing for flexibility and adaptability in different situations. By using cards like Cauldron Familiar, Ranger-Captain of Eos, and Chord of Calling, the deck can search for and play key creatures to combo off and generate value. The inclusion of mana dorks like Gilded Goose and Wall of Roots helps ramp up to the combo pieces quickly. Overall, the deck aims to control the board, find its combo pieces, and win through a mixture of synergy and efficiency.

This deck focuses on utilizing ramp and control elements to accelerate the summoning of powerful Eldrazi creatures onto the battlefield. By using cards like Utopia Sprawl and Talisman of Impulse, the deck aims to generate enough mana to cast devastating threats such as Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. The deck also includes disruption spells like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble to control the board and protect its creatures. With the combination of ramp and control, the deck seeks to overwhelm opponents with its Eldrazi threats and dominate the game.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble the Colossus Hammer combo using Puresteel Paladin and Stoneforge Mystic to equip the hammer for a huge power boost. Leyline Axe and Battlefield Improvisation help to generate additional equipment for the combo. Urza's Saga provides additional utility and card advantage. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and powerful combo, utilizing cards like Mox Opal and Urza's Saga to accelerate the process. Inkmoth Nexus and Shadowspear provide additional versatility and potential win conditions.

This deck focuses on fast reanimation and cheating massive Eldrazi creatures into play to overwhelm the opponent. With cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Through the Breach, the goal is to quickly bring out powerful threats like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Ulamog, the Defiler. The combination of instant reanimator cards and powerful Finishers allows for explosive plays that can end the game in a few turns. The deck also includes support cards like Thought-Knot Seer and Devourer of Destiny to disrupt the opponent's plans and further solidify its advantage.

This deck focuses on aggressive creatures that disrupt the opponent's game plan while also utilizing powerful removal and hand disruption spells to control the pace of the game. The creatures in the deck have abilities that can disrupt the opponent's strategy, and the removal spells help deal with threats efficiently. The hand disruption spells help to preemptively disrupt the opponent's plans, while also providing information about their hand. The mana base is built to support the aggressive creatures and provide consistent access to the deck's powerful spells.

This deck focuses on utilizing The Underworld Cookbook to enable various strategies, from discarding cards for value to cheating powerful creatures into play. It includes a mix of disruption, removal, and threats to apply pressure on the opponent. The goal is to efficiently use the resources in hand to outpace the opponent and win the game quickly. The inclusion of key cards like Profane Tutor and Goryo's Vengeance allows for explosive plays and unexpected combos to help secure victory.
